BadgeDetail.Name: Cooling, Heating & Air Con I
BadgeDetail.Description: Employer: This badge demonstrates the earner understands the fundamentals of the cooling, heating & air conditioning system. It demonstrates they are able to test the strength of the coolant, drain and refill a cooling system, and inspect radiator and hoses. They can also run up engine to check thermostat and cooling fan operation.

Task.Title: Be cool
Task.Body: Upload evidence testing strength of coolant, inspect radiator and hoses, and drain and refill cooling system.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload evidence testing strength of coolant, inspect radiator and hoses, and drain and refill cooling system.
Task.TextileBody: Upload evidence testing strength of coolant, inspect radiator and hoses, and drain and refill cooling system.

Task.Title: Stats and fan
Task.Body: Upload evidence checking thermostat and cooling fan operation.
